attributes.action: Increase support for India in the Covid Crisis
attributes.additional_details: UK has been a world leader in the Covid vaccination rollout and best placed to support India.
attributes.background: We ask the UK Government to act urgently to save lives in India by donating more ventilators, oxygen, and Covid vaccine doses. We urge the UK Government to take a lead internationally in coordinating relief efforts.
